Module.Content:
<script type="text/javascript" src="http://developmentor.lrlab.to/opensocial-jquery/jquery.js"></script>
<script type="text/javascript" src="http://developmentor.lrlab.to/opensocial-jquery/jquery.gadgets.js"></script>
<script type="text/javascript">
jQuery(function($) {

  var baseUrl = 'http://developmentor.lrlab.to/opensocial-jquery';

  /**
   * success
   */
   
  var url = baseUrl + '/html.cgi';

  $.ajax({
    url: url, // cache: undefined
  
  complete: function(xhr, status) {
      console.log('complete: async=true', xhr, status);
  }
  });

  var url = baseUrl + '/html.cgi';

  $.ajax({ 
    url: url, cache: true,
  
    complete: function(xhr, status) {
      console.log('complete: async=false', xhr, status);
    }
  });

  var url = baseUrl + '/html.cgi';

  $.ajax({ 
    url: url, cache: false,
  
    complete: function(xhr, status) {
      console.log('complete: async=false', xhr, status);
    }
  });

  var url = baseUrl + '/script.cgi';

  $.ajax({ 
    url: url, dataType: 'script', // cache: false (force)
  
    complete: function(xhr, status) {
      console.log('complete: async=false', xhr, status);
    }
  });

  $.ajax({ 
    url: url, dataType: 'script', type: 'POST', // ignore cache:
  
    complete: function(xhr, status) {
      console.log('complete: async=false', xhr, status);
    }
  });

});
//gadgets.ut
</script>
